Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.security

Class JwtUtils

java.lang.Object
com.PDLB.PPE.API.security.JwtUtils
@Component public class JwtUtils extends Object
JwtUtils is responsible for handling JWT (JSON Web Token) related tasks, such as generating JWT tokens, parsing tokens, and validating tokens.

    • getJwtFromCookies

      public String getJwtFromCookies(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieves the JWT token from a cookie in the given HTTP request.
      Parameters:
      request - the HTTP request to retrieve the JWT token from
      Returns:
      the JWT token string or null if it doesn't exist

      Returns:
      the new JWT cookie

      Returns:

    • getUserNameFromJwtToken

      public String getUserNameFromJwtToken(String token)
      Retrieves the username from the given JWT token.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token string to retrieve the username from
      Returns:
      the username contained within the JWT token

    • validateJwtToken

      public boolean validateJwtToken(String authToken)
      Validates the given JWT token.
      Parameters:
      authToken - the JWT token to validate
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid, false otherwise

    • generateTokenFromUsername

      Generates a new JWT token for the given username.

      Returns:
